long_description: The high-performance REI Compound Soft-Shell jacket is highly water- and wind-resistant and provides breathable warmth. It's designed for fast-moving athletes in winter weather. Soft-shell fabric with 2-way mechanical stretch features a smooth, pill-resistant knit face and a jacquard fleece laminated interior backing for warmth and wicking. Full-length storm guard seals out the cold wind; soft lined collar and chin guard protect sensitive skin. Jacket is windproof to 60 mph. Zip chest pocket with interior cord port; 2 zip handwarmer pockets; rip-and-stick cuff tabs; internal hem drawcord. Pocket welts, cuff tabs and cord exit are reinforced with contrasting overlay tape for durability. With an active fit, the REI Compound Soft-Shell jacket can be worn on its own or layered underneath a waterproof shell.
short_description: The high-performance REI Compound Soft-Shell jacket is highly water- and wind-resistant and provides breathable warmth. It's designed for fast-moving athletes in winter weather.
